homeAboutCompany: Our company was founded in 2015 and specializes in the production of corrugated boxes, color-printed packaging, labels, booklets, and flyers. We offer a full cycle of services ‚Äî from design development to finished product delivery ‚Äî allowing clients to save time and get everything in one place. We produce packaging of any complexity and size ‚Äî from single-layer to five-layer boxes, with or without printing, made to individual order. The main goal of our company is to create high-quality, convenient, and aesthetic packaging solutions that highlight the individuality of your brand. We value reliability, precision, and deadlines, ensuring every delivery is completed under contract and on time. Each year, we improve our technologies and expand our capabilities to offer clients even higher quality and more favorable cooperation terms.
ownProductionDesc: We control the entire process ‚Äî from raw materials to the finished box. This ensures consistent quality and precise deadlines.
designPrintDesc: We create unique packaging designs and perform printing of any complexity directly at our facility.
fastReliableDesc: We meet deadlines regardless of order size. We work accurately, without delays or quality compromises.
bestPricesDesc: We produce without intermediaries, allowing us to offer excellent quality at a fair cost.
contractWorkDesc: Each order is officially documented ‚Äî with clear terms, deadlines, and a guarantee of results.
qualityGrowthDesc: We use modern technologies and eco-friendly materials, constantly improving our service and product quality.

home.about.title: About us
home.about.text1: Universal Box was founded in 2015 and has established itself as a reliable manufacturer of high-quality packaging products and printing services.
home.about.text2: Our main activity includes the production of corrugated boxes, color-printed boxes, labels, booklets, and flyers.
home.about.text3: We offer packaging in various sizes and shapes. Our products:
home.about.list1: Are made from corrugated cardboard with 1 to 5 layers
home.about.list2: Come in both color-printed and plain (non-printed) options
home.about.list3: Can be custom-made with any design and size according to the client‚Äôs order

home.production.title: Production
home.production.text1: All processes, from design to finished product, are carried out within one facility.
home.production.text2: This saves clients time and costs ‚Äî everything can be completed in one place.
home.production.text3: Our designers work closely with clients, offering solutions based on existing designs or developing new projects.
home.production.text4: Production processes are performed using modern equipment, with quality control at every stage.
home.production.text5: We deliver products on time ‚Äî fast, high-quality, and at affordable prices.

home.cooperation.title: Cooperation
home.cooperation.text1: Each order is executed under a formal contract.
home.cooperation.text2: We offer our clients long-term and mutually beneficial cooperation. In the future, we aim to create even more convenient and high-quality service opportunities.
home.cooperation.list1: Quality ‚Äî striving for excellence in every product
home.cooperation.list2: Speed ‚Äî delivering orders within the agreed deadlines
home.cooperation.list3: Flexibility ‚Äî an individual approach to each client

honest.title: Everything is Transparent Here!
honest.p1: All activities and products of ‚ÄúUNIVERSAL BOX‚Äù LLC are officially certified. Our corrugated boxes are approved by the State Certification Center ‚ÄúUzTest‚Äù of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
honest.p2: This certificate confirms that our products:
honest.list1: fully comply with national and international standards,
honest.list2: meet all quality and safety requirements,
honest.list3: are produced under strict quality control.
honest.org: üè¢ Issued by: ‚ÄúUzTest‚Äù State Center, Republic of Uzbekistan
honest.p3: We deliver reliable, certified, and high-quality products to our customers.
honest.end: That‚Äôs why ‚Äî everything is transparent here!
